attributes.action: Reinstate The Dog Licence to work alongside the current Microchip scheme.
attributes.additional_details:
Breeder details to be given for first licence. Discounts may be offered for neutered dogs & owners who have passed training schemes. 

Multiple dog households will require a licence for each dog. Dogs in rescue need to be registered but only need a licence once in a home. Licences expire annually & will need to be renewed. When a dog reaches end of life the licence office are to be notified. Alongside microchipping it should provide traceability & accountability to safeguard a dog for life.
attributes.background:
DOTS LAW - Proven in countries around the world to help control back street breeding, dog theft & reduce cases of abuse & neglect. We believe it will also benefit animal charities & council shelters. 

Every dog will require a licence, working & assistance dogs will be exempt of a fee.
